title: evaradharinthurayya
sahitya:
evarAdarinturayyA rAmayyA nannevarAdarinturayya

anupallavi

 bhava sAgaramuna baDi dAri gAnaka divi rAtrulayanturayyA

caraNam 1

 tAmasuDagu nAdu tApamulanu dIrci dhairyamulanu balkarA rAmA 
nI mahAtmiyamu lavalEsamaina nE nerugani vADanurA rAma
bhUmilO nAvaNTi patituni brOcitE puNyamu galgunurA rAmA
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata pUjita ninuvinA
